descriptions:
["DescriptionThis is a 7 bedroom villa located in a gated community called Emirates Hills. Named after Beverly Hills in L.A., Emirates Hills is largely home to the expatriate community of Dubai as it consists of the first freehold properties to be sold in the city. 
FEATURES:
7 Bedrooms
9 Bathrooms
It is the very first community where plots were sold to individuals to build the house of their choice. 
Emirates Hills properties look out over the fairways of the Address Montgomerie, an 18-hole golf course created by architect Desmond Muirhead and golfer Colin Montgomerie.
It is close to Dubai British School, Dubai International Academy, Emirates International School, Meadows and Emirates Hill Nursery, and Raffles Nursery. 
This villa has full views of the lake and located away from the road noise and traffic. It has 7bedrooms all ensuite, 2 guest bathrooms, 2 kitchens and spacious living rooms and family area. Comes with lift, maid's and driver's rooms and a fully landscaped garden with swimming pool and Gazebos.
It is currently rented and will be vacant by Q1/Q2 2020. Please call us to book a viewing."]

['DescriptionA beautifully designed mansion with Italian finishes from the City of Panaro in a contemporary style with an extra special touch of sophistication on the famous Montgomerie Golf course overlooking the 16th hole. 
Built and designed by a leading Italian architect, the property offers cutting edge technology and a “no expense” spared” approach to luxury and personal comfort, all expertly adapted for lavish entertaining and flexible modern living. Situated in the Beverly Hills of Dubai, each artifact, chandelier or even the stairway is magnificent. Breathtaking views of the iconic skyline of Dubai and golf course..
The fixtures and fittings in this magnificent villa have been meticulously handpicked and imported from all over the world. The marble flooring throughout the villa is the highest grade Navona travertine from Italy. The mosaics, all external wood shutters and fixtures are the finest teak. The internal doors are solid oak. The chef’s kitchen is custom made with details like a teppanyaki station for fine entertainment and dinning experience or the family and guests. The villa has been built up to 20,500 sq.ft. and the plot 27,734.71 sq.ft.

descriptions: ['DescriptionD&B Properties are pleased to offer for sale this stunning 3 bedroom villa in Greenview 2, Expo Golf Villas, Emaar South by EmaarLIMITED 3 and 4 BEDROOM VILLAS FOR THE BEST PRICE OFFER.* Selling Price starts from: AED 1,077,000* 3 bedroom with en-suite bathrooms* BUA starts from: 1,890 Square Feet* Ready by 2022* With garden and terrace* Within walking distance to the 18-hole Championship Golf Course, increasing the property value* Private community with parks, Rove Hotel & Community Centre, Regional Mall* Views of the Community Centre, Pool, Lawn & Kids Play Areas* 10 minutes away from EXPO 2020Payment Plan:* 2-Year Post Completion Payment Plan* 1% Equal Monthly Installment* 100% DLD Registration WaiverThe Expo Golf Villas are located in the greenest upcoming neighbourhood, mins away from Expo 2020, 18-hole Championship golf course & global aviation hub.Contact our Off Plan Specialist to book yours at +971565203470 | 800DANDB | www.dandbdubai.com.D & B Properties is a leading real estate company in the Intl Off-Plan market.']
